forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 10pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The sun graces Downtown San Francisco today, bathing the city in a gentle light that seems to dance upon the rooftops. With a high cruising close to 64 degrees, the warmth settles in the air, though it gradually dips to a cooler 59 by the afternoon, inviting a cozy sweater or light jacket. The southwest winds whisper softly through the streets, a mere murmur of 2 to 8 mph, adding a pleasant touch without stealing away the comfort of the day. As evening falls, a slight chance of drizzle looms, hinting at the possibility of rain between the hours of 10 PM and 4 AM. The night will cloak the city in a shroud of clouds, settling around a low of 52 degrees—yet the chance of precipitation remains a mere whisper at 20%.

As you stroll along the waterfront or meander through the leafy boulevards, take a moment to enjoy the clarity of the day—there’s an intoxicating vibrancy to the horizon as it meets the shimmering bay. While no thick fog blankets the city, a soft marine haze clings to parts of the Golden Gate, creating just the right atmosphere for a contemplative wander. The conditions favor a leisurely afternoon spent reading at a cozy café or simply savoring the vibrant streets on foot. For the evening, consider an easy dinner at a local spot, perhaps indulging in the perfumed scents of freshly prepared seafood as the city prepares for slumber. Embrace this beautiful day, a fleeting gift before the clouds roll in tonight.
